The slight crinkle in her step to her might as well been an alarm to her, sure that everyone was about to hear it. Vanilla grabbed a cart and headed in. Starting with her groceries, she pulled out a list and began browsing for her desired items. It didn't take long to test Cream's patience. "Mommy? Um... Can Amy take me to go look at the toys now?" Vanilla responded with a 'Hmm' and looked past her begging daughter towards the now skittish hedgehog. It was like almost like she was a small critter in the woods and any sudden movement might be out to get her. Amy had heard Cream's request and realized her mother's questioning gaze. Vanilla knew her daughter was a handful and wasn't going to unload her on someone unwilling to the task. Amy nodded and Vanilla agreed. She smiled as she watched the diapered pair walk off on their own adventure.

It didn't take long for them to reach the toy section. They hadn't passed too many people on their way there much to the joy of Amy. The few they had certainly hadn't a clue of her diaper. If they did, they didn't make a fuss about it. This gave Amy a bit of confidence. Maybe she could pull this off. Her heart was racing, any wrong movement would spell doom for her. But... was she enjoying this? She was unaware this would be so hot to her. Banishing the thought from her mind, she just wanted to make it out of here without incident first, deal with that train of thought later. "Ooh, Look Amy, it's the new playset. They have it." Amy watched as Cream was enamored with a giant box on the bottom shelf. It looked like a horse ranch for the dolls they had been playing with earlier. Cream bent down to get a better look at it. With that, Amy watched the back of her dress slowly slide up her back and the white diaper become increasingly visible. Amy smirked, taking in the sight but quickly ran her hand across her padded butt. She wanted to make sure her dress wouldn't do the same.

"Amy, do you think mommy would get me this?" Cream turned her head around, eyes wide in excitement. This was a great opportunity for her to tease the poor bunny, and Amy was taking it. "I'm not so sure Cream, that was a pretty big accident you had earlier. In your cute little panties too." Cream huffed, clearly not fond of being reminded of that. "I told you, big girls have accidents too Amy." Amy took in the flustered girl, not letting her go that easy. "Tell me Cream, Did you know you had to go?" Amy knew no matter what she answered, it would hurt her big girl facade. On one hand, if she did know she needed to go she had completely ignored it. On the other, if she didn't know she clearly wasn't the big girl she thought she was. "I had no idea Amy. We were having so much fun I just forgot to go potty. That's all." Amy smiled and patted the innocent girl's head. "That's ok Cream." More than ok. she thought. Cream had a confused look on her face, but went back to looking for toys when...
1112121121.title: Going shopping

choices: Amy makes it to the car
Amy loses control in the store
11121211211.content:
A sudden cramp hit Amy's stomach. Oh crap... why now? Any time but now. This was the worst case scenario. It would be easier for her to walk around in a clean diaper and make an escape without alert. That would become near impossible if she shit herself. If she could help it, that wasn't going to happen. It was a shame though, had she stayed at the house with Cream, she would've filled her diaper up without a second though. She loved the rare chances she'd get to mess in her pants, but certainly not right now. Luckily she still would be able to hold it for a while, but at Cream's rate that wouldn't last. What had been an enjoyment now became a torture, watching the young rabbit look through all the toys. Hurry up Cream. Maybe if I tell her, she'll understand.

"Hey Cream, can we hurry it up? I gotta po..." The bunny turned her head back to Amy, not really hearing what she had said and cocked her head to the side. This interrupted Amy's plea. Damn, Is it really so hard to tell this girl I gotta shit? She doesn't care when she does it. Amy sighed as Cream turned back around and headed into the next isle. The hedgehog follow begrudgingly behind, careful not to expose her secret one way or another. They were now in the section of Legos, tons of build-able sets lined the isle. As Cream stopped when her attention was grabbed by one of them, Amy rested with an arm draped across her gut and slightly bent over. Desperately trying to avoid letting go at all costs. She quickly realized she was in a bit of a compromising stance and tried to straighten her posture. Her dress wouldn't conceal her padding well at all if she leaned too far forward.
Against her will, her bowels released a bit of the pressure on it, in the form of a fart. This sent a shock through Amy's nerves and she tensed up, reassuring that nothing else would escape. It was about this time Cream had finally noticed something was amiss with her friend. "Amy? You ok? We can go get mommy if you need." Without a second of delay, Amy grabbed Cream's hand and headed off. "Yes, please." was all the only thing she got as she was dragged off.

Searching the isles in desperation for Vanilla, Amy wasn't so sure she could hold it for much longer. After what felt like an eternity, they happened upon the mother browsing some dresses for herself. Cream now took the lead and headed over to her. "Hi mommy" she rang out. The bunny headed over to the cart and began examining the stuff she had picked out. A bunch of groceries along with other necessities, but as well as one big package. Specifically a pink package containing diapers in Cream's size. "Mommy, I don't need more diapers. Can we at least get more pullups instead please? I promise I'll be back in panties soon." Vanilla just smirked at her daughter, but quickly went into mother mode. "Honey, what you did this morning doesn't belong in a pullup and certainly not in panties. Where does it belong?" Cream sighed and lowered her head. "Ughh. In a diaper." She said dejected. This took Amy a bit by surprise but Vanilla seemed to have a bit of a grin on her face. Cream quickly realized her mistake and fixed it. "I mean in the potty. Big girls go on the potty." Vanilla nodded and with what could've been a bit of sarcasm in her tone replied "They sure do."

Cream tried to find something to look at so she could just forget her embarrassing blunder. Speaking of..." Amy turned to Vanilla "Can you watch Cream now? I need to run to the potty..." Amy covered her mouth, she didn't believe she had just called it a potty. Maybe she had been spending too much time around Cream. Vanilla just looked at her curiously, "Hmm? You don't wanna use those icky public toilets do you? I'll be finishing up soon. It's a short drive, surely you can hold it til we get home." With that, Vanilla pushed the cart ahead, leaving a blushing hedgehog behind. She really knows how to press my buttons. Good or bad." Amy knew she was right, sort of. She was diapered after all. Even if she made it to the toilet in time, the tapes of her diaper might not make it home. If she tried to tape it back on, there was a chance they'd lose their strength and her diaper could fall off at any time. At worst, they might not work at all. She would have to leave the restroom bare and any wrong movement or innocent breeze could expose herself for the world to see. That had to be a fate worse than a dirty diaper. She marched on, trying to catch up to the rabbits that left her behind. The car was now her new salvation, if she could at least make it there, she was fine. Sure, she might have to apologize to Cream for the smelly drive home, but somehow knew Vanilla wouldn't mind one bit.
11121211211.title: Amy has to go

111212112111.content:
It wasn't much longer before they were heading out of the store anyway. Amy stood by while Vanilla checked out, doing her best not to look like she was in desperate need of relief, which wasn't easy. Trying to avoid leaning or bending at all to avoid exposing her diaper while keeping her bowels in check was the main issue, but she clenched her back cheeks and held on firm. Standing in place was really the only tactic she had, because she couldn't imagine she'd have it easier if she walked around. Cream couldn't do anything about her mother's purchase, and she knew trying to aruge about it would just get her even farther from her own goals.

Once they were paid for and heading out, Amy could feel her bowels loosening as they made their way to the car, as if her body knew instinctively that once they were seated inside the vehicle, it was as good as being on the toilet, perhaps it was because Amy had set it as her goal mentally, perhaps she could have held it longer if she were more confident in herself? It mattered very little as they went out and the bags were put in the back, Amy and Cream were loaded into the car and strapped in while Vanilla got into the drivers seat and off they went. Amy lasted for about a total of ten seconds once the car was in motion, not that she was trying to hold on any further at that point. Her bowel movement was announced to the entire vehicle as a rather brassy fart blew from Amy's backside. Immediately this drew Cream's attention, looking towards Amy and grimacing slightly. "Ew Amy you far-" Cream began to say but even she wasn't that naive when she saw the look on Amy's face, Amy looked like she was extremely happy with herself, as well as being somewhat red in the face. So Cream switched to saying. "Mom, Amy's pooping!" Which Amy might have winced at, if she weren't too busy having an enjoyable bowel movement.

In the front rear view mirror, Vanilla's face could be seen with a slight smirk as the rabbit woman said. "Oh, well we'll change her when we get home." not even batting an eyelash as Cream covered her nose. Now Amy was having a bit of difficulty, trying to go against the seat she was on, she had to push her hands down to raise her bottom up so she could get it all out, though having to sit back down on it was a bit of a mess to say the least. Amy couldn't help but sigh with relief now that the pressure back there had been taken care of, she could just relax and they'd be back soon so she could get cleaned up.
111212112111.title: Amy makes it to the car

choices: Take the exit and find a gas station
1112121121112.content:
Amy sat back, enjoying the new warm mess she now sat on. She was loving every bit of it since she was able to minimize the amount of people who could've seen her. Knowing it was be a decent ride home, she was taking it all in before getting changed. Cream on the other hand was trying to do the opposite. She was switching between holding her nose and fanning the air, trying to get some fresh air. After a few minutes, they hit a bit of traffic and Vanilla peeked in the mirror again. She smiled at her daughter's dismay, but gave her a bit of mercy finally as she rolled the windows in the back down it help mitigate the stench. The hedgehog blushed slightly knowing it was due to her, but wasn't enough to take her out of her own little world.

It became apparent that the traffic wasn't going to lighten up soon and they were in for a long wait as they were forced to creep slowly forward. Since they were sitting still, the open windows only helped so much without the wind. Cream began to squirm around a bit, with her diaper crinkling subtly. The older rabbit didn't know if it was that she was just bored now of if she had to go now as well. She figured it best to break the news to them now though. "Sorry girls, seems like it's gonna be awhile before we can get back. We are near an exit though... maybe we could stop at a gas station if needed." Amy decided to pass on the offer, "It's no big deal I can..." But she was quickly interrupted by her friend "Yes please mommy! She's really stinky!" Amy winced at that statement, I don't smell that bad do I?. Vanilla raised an eyebrow while looking at her daughter in the mirror, "Oh? And yours don't? You're a pretty stinky bunny at times too ya know." Cream didn't argue back, turning her attention to anything she could outside her window. They finally neared the exit. Though both were split on what to do, Vanilla held the steering wheel and the only important vote.
1112121121112.title: There's heavy traffic.

choices: "Cream, do you want to help me change Amy?"

Though it was also to Cream's dismay as the girl let out an audible groan as she looked back at the exit. From there the drive continued on as normal, the traffic started to thin out after too long so they were making much better time now, and the added speed aided in mitigating the smell of Amy's dirty diaper so even Cream didn't have much to complain about as they went along.

Before too long they pulled back up and were heading back inside. Cream was eager to get out of the car, as was Amy. Once everything is inside Vanilla says..

"Cream dear, would you like to help me change Amy's diaper?" That struck Amy cold, freezing her to the spot on the ground where she stood. Why would Vanilla ask such a thing? No need for her to join in on such a vulnerable and more personal moment for the hedgehog. "I figure it's only fair since she gets to help with yours sometimes." Vanilla added on as if to sweeten the offer. Hrmpf, No way she'll accept. Amy thought as she shook her head. "Sure mommy!" the younger rabbit said happily. Amy was floored.

Vanilla had a cheeky smile on her face. "That's a good girl Cream, I'll let you get the supplies while me and Amy head to the bathroom." The younger rabbit headed off to gather Amy's bag as Vanilla took the hedgehog by the hand and was almost forced to drag her along to the bathroom. I figured you'd be happy to get changed, that was such a long car ride to be stuck in that thing." "Well Amy, your much bigger than Cream, your way messier than she typically is. I figured you wouldn't mind the extra help." She said as she gave the diaper a bit of a squish, feeling what she was about to deal with. Despite cooling off, Amy couldn't help but enjoy the act and did her best to hide just how much she was enjoying it. She was failing hard.

Finally, Cream walked through the door, carrying Amy's bag. "Here it is mommy!" She said, seemingly not caring about what had been going on in the room prior to her entrance. Vanilla opened the bag and began to retrieve the necessary supplies. As she searched though the bag, She began to question her daughter. "You took a while to get here Cream... something happen?" Cream dismissed her mom "No mommy, I just... forgot where she put her stuff at." Setting things aside, Vanilla looked at both her diapered girls and...
111212112111222.title: "Cream, do you want to help me change Amy?"

"Well! Let's get this change underway." Vanilla said as she shifted her focus just to Amy. "On the floor Amy." Vanilla said as she looked down at the hedgehog. Amy did her best to suppress a blush as she laid herself down on the floor in front of Vanilla and Cream, Cream had certainly seen Amy get changed before, but that was just being in the same room, often even a few feat away when it happened, now both Vanilla and Cream were getting down on their knees next to her. Instead of just going into the change as normal, Vanilla decided it would be a good idea to show Cream the details from this side of the diaper change.

"Okay, I'm sure you're familiar with what happens first Cream, we start by taking the tapes and tearing them back." Vanilla said, performing those very same actions while she spoke, in just a moment she pulled back the diaper, revealing the mess inside and causing the full smell of it to waft out. Amy noticed Cream making a face as the rabbit got a full blast of the odor, which gave Amy an odd sense of satisfaction, knowing Cream wasn't enjoying this part made her feel a little better.

"Now the easiest way to clean all this up is to." Vanilla grabbed Amy's legs and lifted them up, then her other hand grabbed the diaper and used it to clean off most of the offending mass. "Have to keep their butt up so they don't stain the floor." Vanilla added as Amy felt the blush she'd been trying to keep back fly onto her face with the force of a speeding train, it was bad enough to have Cream watching so intently, but having Vanilla use her like a training tool was too much.

"Wipes." Vanilla said, holding out her hand. Which Cream responded by giving Vanilla the wipes. They were then expertly used by Vanilla to clean Amy up from stem to stern. "Oil." Vanilla said, Cream handed it to her mom and Vanilla carefully applied the baby oil. "Powder." Vanilla then said.

"Oh, can I put the powder on?" Cream asked. Vanilla smiled and said. "Sure hun." Cream grabbed the powder and then began to sprinkle it liberally, so much that Amy had to turn away for a moment as a powder cloud floated out. "Maybe not that much Cream." Vanilla mentioned after Cream finished. While Amy was looking to the side, she noticed that one of the zippers on her bag had been opened up. She'd make sure to check her bag after this.

Amy looked inside the small pocket but found it empty. She had a mini heart attack. How could that be missing? Had she left it at home somehow? No, she remembered putting it there right before leaving. Maybe it had fallen out in the living room or just somewhere else in her bag. She began going though every nook of her bag in search of it. Meanwhile, Vanilla had shifted her attention from the dirty diaper to her daughter.

"I don't think I need to go mommy." She finally replied. Vanilla grinned just a bit. "You don't think you do or you don't have to?" This confused the young girl, unsure of what the difference made. "You know you won't get your panties back unless you stay clean, not that somebody would mind the company." Vanilla hinted towards the hedgehog behind her.

Turning around, Vanilla was now aware of Amy sorting though her bag, clearly desperate to find something. "Amy? Is something the matter dear?" Amy was almost too busy to even notice that they were now focused on her. She finally stopped and looked towards the both of them. "Yes, something went missing from my bag. I have to find it." Vanilla quickly picked up on her desperation and her motherly instincts kicked in. "Oh, no worries Amy. I'm sure it just fell out somewhere. What was it?" "No mommy, I didn't." Cream looked a bit nervous and her mom instantly knew what she was up to. "Cream, did you take something from her bag? You know what will happen if you're lying right?" The older bunny's tone got serious. It petrified Cream, she knew that was the voice she used when she was serious. "I'm sorry, I found something when I was checking her bag for diapers. I wanted to ask her about it later." Vanilla just crossed her arms and scolded her daughter. "Cream! That was very bad of you. You know better than to take things that don't belong to you. Please give it here." She held out her hand, demanding whatever it was that she had stolen. Amy was relieved to hear it hadn't been lost but dreaded it being returned in front of everyone. Cream reached in to a pocket on her dress, pulling out...
11121211211122211.title: Something was missing from the pocket.

111212112111222113.content:
Cream pulled out a little bottle, it rattled slightly when it was shaken even a little bit. Of course Amy felt her face pale as she saw that particular bottle in Cream's hands. It was a plastic bottle of mints, it had the logo on it and everything.

"Mints?" Vanilla asked as she looked at the bottle in Cream's hand.

"Mints." Amy assured her as she reached for and grabbed the bottle, though the slight blush on Amy's face returned as she said that, letting Vanilla know it was more than what Amy claimed. Of course it looked like a bottle of mints, because it was a bottle of mints, but it wasn't holding any mints, the bottle was actually filled with a high strength laxative. Amy kept it around for whenever she was feeling a bit bloated an constipated, and for those occasions where she really wanted to enjoy a messy diaper. "If you wanted a mint Cream, you can just ask me." Amy said, since she also had another bottle of mints, actual ones in her bag as well, as a decoy in case anyone asked her for a mint after all.

Cream looked a little sheepish as Amy said that. "Okay." though Cream didn't ask for a mint then either, which led Amy to wonder, but Vanilla asked the question first.

"Cream, did you eat any of Amy's mints without asking?" looking at her daughter to see if she was lying or not.

Cream looked to her mom and said.

1112121121112221132.content:
"I didn't mommy." The young rabbit said. Though, it wasn't very convincing to either girl listening. "Cream. I warned you already, You know what'll happen if you're caught lying." Vanilla sternly warned the girl. That perked Amy's ears... how would either of them know if she was lying? It's not like she would keep a count of mints. The only way she'd know is if Cream... well... had to go. Even then, she hoped it wouldn't make Vanilla question anything. It wasn't uncommon for the rabbit girls to go multiple times a day due to their faster metabolism. Especially Cream due to her age, much to Amy's delight. "I promise mommy, I didn't." "It's ok. Now tell Amy how sorry you are." Vanilla bent down and patted her daughter's head. "Sorry Amy." She bowed her head. "And?" The older rabbit pushed her on. "I won't take your things again." Cream added on finally. "It's... ok." Amy wasn't worried about if she had taken any, but more concerned with just how many. If she took multiple, it would likely cause issues for the poor girl. So for her sake, hopefully it was just one. She placed the tin of mints back into her bag and tried to let things go, though her mind was racing. Of course, she was excited for the prospect of the girl loading her diaper at some point but she was also doing the math. Usually, just one tablet would cause herself to go within a couple of hours. A girl like her? She'd be feeling the effects within an hour likely, less if it was more than just one. Maybe... just this one time she shouldn't let her desires get the best of her. She could try and rush the girl to the potty at the first sign of danger. Only time would tell what the hedgehog would choose.

"Well, now that it's settled. I'm gonna start dinner ok girls?" Vanilla started heading off to the kitchen. Amy figured without the threat of punishment looming over her, maybe she'd be truthful. "See if your mom needs any help making dinner." Amy said. Now, the reason she suggested this course of action was because she's seen how Cream acted on her own, Amy knew that if she and Cream went off to play together or something like that, Cream would inevitably mess her diaper, she'd pooped in her panties earlier today and that hadn't been influenced by any outside help, so Amy was certain if she distracted Cream at all there was no way the girl could handle what was coming.

Of course helping Vanilla cook wasn't any less distracting, possibly even more so honestly, but Amy figured that if Cream was around her mother and exhibited those signs of needing to go, that Vanilla would be able to pick up on them far before Cream did and help her get to the toilet and avoid a potentially messy disaster. 11121211211122211321.title: Help your mom with dinner

What did I..." Vanilla seen her daughter's head drop as she began to pout. With a heavy sigh, Vanilla knew this wasn't something to get mad about. She embraced her girl with one of her arms. Amy kept a close eye on Cream as soon as her mom left, noticing that...
111212112111222113211.title: Macaroni and Cheese

Cream was looking a little disappointed, but nothing out of the ordinary, certainly nothing in regards to needing to go yet. Though as Amy thought about it, the fact of the matter was, if Cream had eaten one, or more, of her 'mints', Cream probably wouldn't have any time to squirm or show off any of the usual signs of needing to go potty. No, it would probably hit that girl like a thunderbolt, and then some kind of natural disaster would certainly happen in the rabbets diaper. Amy didn't get much more time to contemplate it though as Vanilla soon returned with a mop and bucket.

"Here Cream, hold this for a moment." Vanilla said as she handed Cream the mop while she filled the bucket with a bit of water and cleaning solution. 11132312.title: Tails

111323123.content:
Amy checked through the peephole to see that it was Tails waiting at the door. “Oh good, it’s just Tails.” She thought.

Tails wasn’t just aware of Amy’s secret, he also helped indulge in Amy’s fantasies. Tails also identified as an undeclared diaper wearer and big baby. Amy found out about Tails’ activities when she came to visit him at his home one morning. She wanted to convince him to invent some toys for the local kids, but more for her to get some toys for her “playtime”. She found Tails passed out on the living room couch. He slept on the couch clad in a blue diaper, sucking on a pacifier and cuddling what looked like a baby blanket. Amy confronted Tails on his little “sleepy time” and woke him.

Tails panicked when awaking to Amy; crying and acting hysterical over Amy’s discovery. He was afraid Sonic and friends were going to find out and make him a laughing stock. Amy sat on the couch to comfort Tails. Amy calmed him down and talked it out with Tails. He’s had a liking for diapers and baby things since he got out of diapers. It was therapeutic to him; helping manage the stress of being a child genius and hero. Amy accepted Tails’ interest with open arms. Tails was glad to share with Amy. Amy, enthralled by the fact of having a close friend padded, decided to share her secret. She rose from the couch and raised her skirt, revealing a pink diaper. Tails’ jaw hung open. Amy blushed hard and smiled awkwardly. While feeling embarrassed, she felt glad to establish this new chapter in their relationship.

Tails has served the roll as Amy’s caretaker, playmate, or plaything. Whether it be babysitting the pink hedgehog, playing with her or being her plaything, Tails has been there. Amy opened the door for Tails. “Hi Tails.” Amy greeted. “Come on in.”

“Thanks Amy.” Tails responded. Upon entrance inside, a familiar stench stings his nose. He turns towards Amy.

Amy chuckled nervously. “Sorry, caught me at the wrong moment.”

Tails shrugged it off and both made they’re way to Amy’s room.

“So, what brings you by, Tails?” Amy asked.

“I came to see if the device I made you is functioning properly.” Tails said.

The fox made his way to the hedgehog’s room with hedgehog in tow. Both enter the room and find the device on Amy’s nightstand. The device is a small projector that shows a hypnotic display and plays a soothing lullaby. Tails made this for Amy as a gift for her involvement. Tails inspected the device to make sure everything was running smoothing.

“Alright, everything is good. You’re sure to have many soothing nights Amy. I’ll see you later.” Tails headed for the door.
“Wait.” Amy said. Tails stopped. “Before you go, do you think you can change my diaper? Please?” She asked politely.

“Amy, I came here to check on the invention. Not to be your nanny.” Tails said.

“I know Tails.” Amy said. “But I’ms just big baby. I made stinky and no knows how to change stinkies. I needs help from my bestest ‘butta’. Pwease Twails?” She said in a baby talk. She showed Tails her saddest face she could muster.

“Amy this is one of your lamest cons for a diaper change.” Tails said, slightly annoyed.

Amy’s sad face turned to an angry scowl. “If you don’t change me right now. I’ll knock that brain out of your head and turn into my own baby doll to parade all around.” She threatened.

Tails showed fear on is face and his blood ran cold. An enraged Amy armed with her hammer usually doesn’t end well. Tails grabbed Amy’s diaper bag near her bed. He lied out the changing mat for Amy. Amy immediately sat herself down on the mat, then lied down, ready to receive his services and comply with his request. Tails grabbed the necessary changing supplies. He saw Amy lie on the floor with a cutesy, innocent gesture on her face. It annoyed him.

Tails opened the used diaper, wiped every bit of Amy’s area and bottom, removed the dirty diaper, gave her a second wipe for good measure, sealed the used diaper with the wipes in it, lied down a fresh diaper, covered every inch of her in powder, and sealed the clean diaper around Amy.

“Fank yous, Twails. Yous da bestest.” Amy said baby like. She raised her arm to be aided up by Tails. Tails refused and turned his back.

Amy, remorseful, rose to her feet to comfort Tails. “Hey, I’m sorry about the comment. I guess I really wanted that change.” She said normally.

“You didn’t have to do that.” Tails huffed, arms crossed. “I probably would have changed you anyway. You didn’t have to threaten me.”

“I’m sorry.” Amy said. She came in and hugged Tails. “How about I make it up to you?”

“How?” Tails asked.

“Well, I can let you be my big brother. You can care for me and have authority over me. Or, you can be my baby brother and I can pamper you.” Amy suggested.

Tails made up his mind to take Amy’s offer, but didn’t know what to choose. On one hand, he could get back at Amy for the threat earlier and be a tough ‘brother’. On the other, Amy was a gentle and nurturing caretaker.

What does he choose?

“He looks so cute loving his bottle.” Amy thought.

What happens next?

Amy looked out the door and saw it was her good friend Cream, she breathed a sigh of relief. She opened the door and greeted her young friend.

“Hi Cream, did you bring the stuff for the party?”

“Yep, I sure did,” the young rabbit replied holding a bag full of babyish items and other things. Amy was going to have a party in a couple days with some of her friends who shared the same desires as her and Cream. Then Cream took notice of Amy’s current situation, “guess I showed up at wrong time.”

Amy nervously smiled a little bit. “Yeah I got caught up in the moment a little, please come in.” She allowed her friend to come inside.

“Thanks.” Cream said as she waddled on inside, Amy taking notice. Cream was wearing diaper with a cute orange onesie with butterflies on it with a pacifier clipped to it and a pair of matching padded booties and gloves. Cream enjoyed the baby treatment since her mother had a hard time trying to teach her how to be a big kid, so Vanilla decided to let Cream enjoy her childish lifestyle.

Amy first met Cream when she was 3 years old and was her usual babysitter. One day when they were playing Cream asked Amy if she wanted to dress up like her. This caught Amy off guard, wearing a diaper and baby clothes, she had already moved on from all that.

“Uhhh, no thank you,” Amy said with a nervous look. But Cream had that look on her face like some kids would do with big eyes, a small frown, and quivering lips.

“Pretty pleeeaase?” She asked again. Amy had a nervous sweat and started rubbing her head.

“Uhhh..uhhh..ummmm, *sigh* alright, if it makes you happy then I’ll do it.” she sighed in defeat, not wanting to upset her friend further.

Cream cheered in happiness. “YAAAAY!! We’re gonna have so much fun.” She grabbed Amy’s hand and led her to the closet. “Pick what you want to wear Ms. Amy, I bet you’ll love it so much.”

As the two played together, Amy was starting to feel comfortable wear baby clothes and a diaper. She made food for the both of them, changed Cream, watched TV, then she put Cream down for a nap. Amy thought now would be a good time to put her normal clothes on and take the diaper off, but something felt different than earlier, she was starting to like this. It felt good drinking from a bottle, then she grabbed one of Cream’s pacifiers and put it in her mouth and sucked on it. The feeling of the pacifier brought back memories of her own baby days, then without warning she heard the front door open.

-end of flashback-

1121.content:
Amy unconsciously squeezed her eyes shut in a vain attempt to block out the sunlight peering in through her bedroom window. She always despised mornings and this one was no different. She groaned as she realized the futility of her efforts.The sun would not be relenting any time soon. Amy slowly opened her eyes. Awakening from the deep sleep of the previous night left her in a groggy head space. It took her a minute to familiarize herself with her surroundings. Eventually, it started coming back to her. This was her new bedroom. She and her mom had just moved here a couple weeks ago.

Moving is always stressful, especially when it involves uprooting your entire life and trying to start over in an unfamiliar city. Of course, she understood why her mother needed to do this. She harbored no hostilities. Still, she wished things could go back to the way they were and never had to change.

As Amy processed her surroundings, she suddenly became aware of an all too familiar sensation. Her eyes shot open.

"No, no, no! Not again!" she muttered to herself as she whipped the bedding off of her. She was greeted with the same sight she had seen every morning since they moved in: a large damp circle surrounding her and drenched pajamas. She had wet the bed. Again.

This crisis immediately sparked her to life. She frantically began yanking the sheets off her bed and massing them into a giant ball. She quickly removed her pajama pants and added them to the pile. She grabbed a pair of sweats off her cluttered floor and hopped around her room, as she tried to get her legs through the openings. She had to make it to the washing machine without her mother seeing. Naturally, she worried about a possible punishment, but more than that, she could not bear the shame that would accompany disappointing her mother again.

She hesitantly creaked the door open. She glanced around, making sure her mother was nowhere to be found. When she felt the coast was clear she scurried out and down the hall. The washing machine was in sight. She felt an immediate sense of relief. But it would be short lived, as in order to get there, she walked by the kitchen.

"Amy Rose!" Amy froze, as a defeated grimace overcame her face. "What are you doing?" Her mother's sharp voice emanated from the kitchen. Amy turned to see her mother approaching fast.

"Oh, h-hi, mom! Just... d-doing some morning laundry!" she feigned a smile, in a final effort to avoid her impending doom.

"You're washing your sheets? Again? Didn't we just wash those yesterday?" her mother had the condescending, all-knowing tone that only a mother can have. She clearly knew what happened, but she was letting Amy hopelessly struggle in the web of her lie.

Amy could not think of anything to say. A wave of hot embarrassment washed over her face and she could feel her throat closing up. Amy could only look down and nod. Her mother now towered over her. She extended her hand to Amy, a gesture saying, "Hand it over," without any actual words being said. Amy reluctantly gave her mother the ball of sheets.

Upon touching them, Amy's mother could immediately confirm her suspicions.

"Again?!" Amy's mother snapped, with a sudden burst of anger in her voice. "Amy, we cannot keep doing this every day!"

Amy eyes were glued to the floor, as if somehow it held the key to her salvation. She was barely able to squeak out a quiet, "I'm sorry, Mom," before losing her voice all together. Her vision became blurred by the presence of tears starting to form in the corners of her eyes.

"Sorrys aren't good enough," her mother admonished. "At this rate, you're going to ruin your sheets, your pajamas... your mattress is probably already stained," she frowned and shook her head. She paused, as if deeply contemplating her next sentence. Finally, she sighed, before continuing.

“Amy, I was really hoping it would not come to this, but you’ve left me no choice…” Amy’s mother started ominously. She went into the laundry room and started the wash cycle for the sheets. Amy remained in place, still unable to say anything. She could hear her mother moving things around. She was not sure what would come next, but she had a bad feeling about it.

When Amy’s mother emerged from the laundry room, she was carrying a large package under her arm. Amy tilted her head up, just enough to identify what her mother was carrying. Upon seeing it, Amy’s voice miraculously returned.

“NO! I am NOT going to wear diapers, Mom!” Amy whined. She was immediately defensive, as she held up her hands in a preemptive attempt to keep her mother away.

“Amy, I am not any happier about this than you are. I waited two weeks for you to figure this out yourself and you are clearly not making any progress. So, until you can prove to me that you do not need these, you will be wearing diapers to bed, every night. End of discussion.”

“Noooooo! Mom, that’s way too embarrassing! I am not going to wear diapers!” Amy clutched her fists and stamped her foot, with a look of childish defiance in her eyes. Amy’s mother was unimpressed.

“You know what, Amy? You wet the bed, you tried to lie about it, and now you are throwing a tantrum. Your behavior this morning has gone from disappointing to downright inexcusable!” Amy’s mother paused again, eyeing her daughter for a moment.

“That settles it. I’m going to do something I haven’t needed to do for more than 10 years.” Amy’s mother swiftly grabbed her daughter’s wrist and began pulling her to the kitchen table. Amy was startled and confused. Her mother had not grabbed her like this since she was a child. Amy briefly tried to resist, but her mother proved to be too strong and was not even phased by Amy’s resistance.

Amy’s mother set the diapers on the table and sat down on a chair, pulling Amy to her right side. “Amy Rose, I will not tolerate your behavior any longer! You're getting a spanking!”

At the mention of a spanking, Amy’s entire world seemed to slow down. She had outgrown spankings ages ago, but the memories of how painful they were came flooding back. She could not stand to think about it, yet here she was, about to relive the traumatic experiences.

Amy was too stunned to fight back as her mother lowered her pants pulled her over the waiting knee. Before she knew it, Amy's bottom was perfectly positioned for a spanking.

*SMACK*

A hand making contact with her bottom was enough bring Amy back to reality.

“Ow!” she cried out. But before she could completely process what was happening, a rain of spanks landed on her butt.

*SMACK SMACK SMACK SMACK*

“Ow! Ow! OW! OWW!” the volume of Amy’s cries increased with each spank. Clearly, years of not spanking had not diminished her mother’s expertise.

“Honestly, this has been a long time coming, Amy,” her mother chided, without breaking the rhythm of the spanking. “I’m beginning to think it was a mistake when I decided to stop spanking you, all those years ago.”

Before long, the pain, combined with the humiliation of the whole situation, overwhelmed Amy. Tears began flowing down her face as her cries turned into sobs.

“Please! OW! I’m sorry, mommy! AHHH! Please, stop spanking me! I’ll be good! OWWWW! Please, mommy!”

She had not said “mommy” for many years, but something about the spanking made it seem natural. Eventually, Amy’s sobbing and begging turned into nonsensical blubbering. Her legs were kicking and flailing so much that her pants were flung off, leaving her bare from the waist down. She wiggled and squirmed, trying to get away, but her mother held her firmly in place. She was bawling uncontrollably, willing to do anything to make the pain stop. But her mother was not convinced, yet. The spanking continued.

The whole spanking probably only lasted about 15 minutes, but Amy will never be able to confirm that. She had lost all concept of time. When her mother finally stopped, all Amy could do was cry. And she continued crying, as her mother sat her up and pulled her into a hug. Amy’s butt was on fire, but surprisingly, the embrace did wonders to help Amy calm down.

Eventually, her tears turned to sniffles, as Amy final regained some semblance of composure. Sensing this, her mother continued with the next segment of her punishment.

“Amy, I love you, but I will not tolerate this kind of behavior any more. If you act up again, you can expect the exact same treatment,” Amy was still unable to speak, but she managed a subtle nod. “Now, normally, you will only be wearing these diapers at night, but to further demonstrate exactly how childish you have been behaving, I’ve decided that you are going to be in diapers for the rest of today, as well. Come with me.”

Amy’s mother led her to their living room, still bare from the waist down. Part of her felt like she should resist, but her will had been broken. She submissively followed her mother, completely accepting what was to come. Her mother laid her down over an open diaper. Amy had not even realized her mother had grabbed baby powder, until it was being applied. It was an unusual sensation, but the cool powder actually felt good on her red bottom. Then the diaper was wrapped around her waist and taped in place. Amy examined her diaper. It had cute floral designs on the front. She had not been diapered since she was a baby. The thickness created an unusual sensation between her legs, but ultimately, the soft seat felt good in her condition.

“Now go stand in the corner for a bit and think about your behavior today. This could have all been avoided, if you’d behaved like an adult,” her mother commanded. Amy did as she was told, standing in the corner of the living room, with her spanked, diapered bottom on display. She contemplated everything that happened before realizing that if she had to wear diapers for the rest of the day, her day was about to get a whole lot worse.

131.content:
In a nearby forest, all seems peaceful tonight. Moonlight radiates the forest trees and glistened the dew on leaves. Not a peep was heard through the forest: not a bird's chirp or a frog's croak. All was peaceful and perfect for a bat to prowl. Rouge stood on a branch of a tall tree, scoping out the target for her next heist. Her target was holding a Chaos Emerald she intended to get her hands on. To satisfy her jewels craving. Rouge finished surveying the area gilded silently to the target.

"This is going to be easy." Rouge thought with a smirk on her face. "Robbing ... should be a cakewalk."

Who's the target?

Rouge flew around eggmans base. She then broke in and saw a chaos emerald. “Too easy” she said as she grabbed the jem but as soon as she did a gas filled the room. 1312.content:
Rouge spotted Tail’s workshop up ahead. She glided gracefully towards the roof and landed silently. Rouge overlooked the skylight of the workshop, examining Tails workspace and hanger below. There stood his plane, The Tornado, crates of spare parts, a large cabinet full of inventions, a shelf full of chemicals, two fuel tanks near the Tornado, and a large workbench with a large tool wall displaying multiple tools. Tails resided at his workbench working on his next invention. Tails welded together different pieces of his new inventions; too absorbed with his work to notice his surroundings.

“I almost feel bad for stealing from him.” Rouge thought.

Rouge found the opening in the skylight and entered through. She landed softly on the Workshop floor. She saw Tails for a quick glance. Tails operated on his next invention uninterrupted. Rouge moved swiftly and silently from Tails workshop.

“Now where did Fox Boy hide that Chaos Emerald?” Rouge pondered.

Rouge explored Tails home. She checked his living room, kitchen, and bathroom for anything leading to the emerald. But a thorough search through each room revealed nothing. The next room she searched was Tails’ Bedroom. Entering the room, Rouge surveyed the room to figure out where Tails hid the emerald. She laid her eyes upon a picture of him, Sonic, Knuckles, and Amy. Rouge removed the painting and found a hidden wall safe.

“There it is. He should have put a note saying ‘steal me’ on the safe while he was at it.” Rouge thought.

The wall safe had a combination lock. Rouge pressed her ear to the side of the safe as she cracked the safe. Her fine hearing picked up on the clicks of the combination lock. She unlocked the safe, revealing a precious Chaos Emerald on its own personal stand. She slipped her hand into the safe to grab the Chaos Emerald. She grabbed it; she smiled ear to ear over this successful heist, or so she thought. Once the emerald was elevated from the stand, a strange green gas emitted instantly, clouding over Rouge. This gas caught Rouge off guard, causing her to cough. She felt faint and collapsed to the ground. An alarm began blaring and blew Rouge’s cover. She struggled to stay conscious; fighting to elevate herself but ultimately failing. Rouge lied helplessly on the ground on the verge of fainting. Before passing out, she watched a pair of white and red sneakers step towards her.

Tail’s looked over his open safe, his misplaced Chaos Emerald, and the unconscious bat lying on his floor. He walked over to the open safe and tapped a hidden button placed inside the safe. Tails placed the switch, along with a booby trap incase anyone tried to steal the emerald. He put the emerald back, rearmed and sealed his safe, and examined Rouge.

“I can’t believe you tried to steal from me again.” Tails thought. “You are such a brat, Rouge. But have a proper punishment for a brat like you.”

What does Tails have in mind for Rouge?

13121.content:
Rouge moaned as she regained consciousness from Tails booby trap. She felt groggy and suffered some headache.

“Ugh. I can’t believe I fell for that.” Rough thought; disgusted in herself for being captured. “Shouldn’t have underestimated him.”

Rouge tried to rise to her feet, but to no benefit. She was restrained in what looked like to be a high chair. Rouge surveyed her current environment. It looked to be a nursery, but it seemed off. It appeared to look like a nursery; the walls colored with a pastel light pink and toys scattered around, but the furniture was off. The furniture; crib, playpen, changing table; looked too big to be for a baby and looked more to accommodate an adult. Rouge struggled in the high chair to shake herself loose, but to no avail.

“It’s no use.” Chimed a familiar voice. “You’re not going to get out of what I have planned for you.”

Rouge scanned the room to find her captor. She spotted Tails, sitting in a rocking chair parallel to the high chair.

“Tails, you two-tailed creep, what have you done to m-…” Rouge’s shouting cut short by a baby bottle plunged into her mouth.

Rouge struggled to not swallow the strange formula slowly trickling down her throat. Rouge’s eyes fixated on a white-gloved hand with a metallic tentacle attached to the wrist holding the bottle. Her eyes trailed the tentacle to it’s source. There stood a Mobian with a mechanical tentacle coming out its back. It looked like a mature, female, Mobian fox with light-orange fur and wavy, red hair; wearing a casual, blue dress, a white apron, matching, blue pumps, and a matching headband. But, without a doubt, Rouge knew that it’s a machine.

“You like my invention Rouge?” Tails asked. “It’s a robot I designed to act as a nanny. I planned on giving to a local daycare, but I never got around to really test it. But, given your current predicament, I think this would be a good opportunity to test it.”

Rouge glared strongly at Tails with anger and disgust.

“Okay, how about I let you out of that high chair after you finish that bottle?” Tails asked.

Rouge rolled her eyes for how ridiculous all this was. She suckled the formula down, drinking as much as she could. It wasn’t much of a challenge. Once Rouge finished the formula, the nanny-bot raised the high chair’s tray and removed Rouge’s restraints. Rouge ran towards the door once released. She hoped to make a quick getaway, but something felt wrong. Her legs grew weaker. She lost her balance and fell onto the floor. Her arms and legs started to feel like jelly. Rouge desperately crawled to the door. She mustered up whatever strength she had left in a last-ditch effort. Her actions proved futile when a hand on a tentacle swooped her up by her underside. The tentacle brought her close to Tails and the nanny-bot, looking them both in the eye.

“I said I’d let you out of the chair. I didn’t say we were done.” Tails exclaimed sternly. “You’re going to be the guinea pig for my robot.”

“Uee pan’t bu bis bu reep.” Rouge slurred as the relaxant took effect on her speech.

“I can. It’s also fitting for a brat like you.” Tails smirked “Nanny-bot, treat her like she’s your very own child. Attend to her needs, be gentle with her, discipline her when necessary, and be with her at all times. Make sure she doesn’t leave and give her the ‘formula’ every 24 hours. I’ll be back to check on you two later.”

“Understood.” The nanny-bot assured Tails in her robotic yet motherly and feminine tone. Tails left the nursery to continue his work. The nanny-bot faced Rouge. “Come along, sweetums. Let’s wash you up and get you comfortable.”

Five more hands appeared out of the robot’s back. Two went to a nearby bathroom in the nursery to draw a bath. Four grabbed Rouge by each limb and raised her. Once the bath faucet ran, one hand returned a pointed its index finger at Rouge. It emitted a blue beam; it singed lines into Rouge’s jumpsuit for it to be removed, but brought no harm to Rouge. Rouge’s jumpsuit swiped off her body in a single flick of one of the hand’s, leaving Rouge in just her underwear. They were the next to go.

Once the bathtub filled up, the nanny-bot carried a stark-naked Rouge to the bathroom and placed her into the tub. The bath water felt comfortably warm. The nanny grabbed a soft sponge, lathered it with soap, and washed Rouge. Rouge blushed heavily as the machine scrubbed her down, especially when it reached some personal areas. Rouge whined incomprehensible babble during the bath. Rouge’s babble was eventually cut by a pacifier plopped into her mouth by the nanny.

The nanny-bot removed Rouge from the bath, toweled her off, and brought her to the changing table. The nanny-bot buckled Rouge down to prevent fidgeting. Rouge tried to fidget and shake, but her jelly muscles kept it short. The nanny-bot brought out baby wipes, baby powder, and a babyish diaper big enough to fit Rouge. The robot lied down the diaper underneath Rouge, touched up her privates with baby wipes, generously powdering her privates and rear, and finally sealing the diaper. Rouge groaned behind her pacifier. The nanny-bot’s extra hands pulled out a pink, childish dress, pink mittens, pink booties, and a pink bow from a nearby wardrobe to dress Rouge. The robot undid the restraint on the changing table, picked up Rouge and dressed her accordingly.

“There we go.” The nanny-bot chimed. “Now my baby is all set.”

The nanny-bot placed Rouge in a nearby playpen. Her extra hands grabbed some toys from a toybox nearby. Her hands gave Rouge a variety of toys to play with. After Rouge was placed and given some toys, the nanny-bot retired to the nearby rocking chair and watched Rouge, letting Rouge carry on with her business. Rouge crossed her arms and pouted over her situation. One of the most cunning jewel thief’s ever scene forced to be a toddler.

“Tails is dead when I get my hands on him.” Rouge thought.

13122.content:
Hours had passed since Rouge fell into Tails' trap, unconscious and unaware of any time that had passed. Eventually she regained her consciousnesses. Her eyelids opened slowly. Rouge first saw what looked like to be a mobile. A simple, white, baby mobile with stars and moons hanging. Rouge turned her head left, then right to take note of her current surroundings. At first, she saw tall, wide, white bars surround her from each side.

"Where am I?" Rouge thought, shuffling around. Then, what sounded like plastic crinkling hit her ear. "Wait, am I in a ..? No, it can't be."

Rouge looks down toward her lower half. She sees that she's wearing what looks like a onesie. A pink onesie with designs of candy and blue highlights apparently big enough to fit Rouge. Rouge grabbed the bottom of the onesie, slipping her fingers in between the snaps. She pulled, but had a little trouble.

"I can't pull this apart." Rouge thought. "Why does my arm feel so weak?"

After a few good tugs, the onesie came undone. Rouge felt the area, only to have her dread confirmed. A large, plain white diaper wrapped around her bottom and privates. Rouge rose upward off her back. Her body felt sluggish, her arms and legs felt like jelly. She tried to stand up but to no avail. Her legs had little strength to lift her. She pushed herself as hard as she could to stand, but ended up back on her knees.

"There must have been some kind of muscle relaxant in the gas." Rouge thought. "It's probably why I'm in the diaper."

Rouge grabbed one of the vertical bars to help assist her up. She looked around the room, and couldn't believe what she saw. It looked like to be a nursery. It had the common setup of a nursery, except the furniture looked much bigger. Big enough to accommodate a Mobian adult.

"Okay, this is strange." Rouge thought. "Tails must be some kind of sicko. I need to see him. I need to call him."

Rouge took a deep breath, ready to shout. But, when she shouted, all she could do is cry. She cried like an infant in distress. Rouge stopped to seal her mouth with her hands.

"What the ...? Was that me?" Rouge thought.

Suddenly, the door swung open. Rouge looked toward the room's doorway. Walking through the doorway was Tails, Cream, and her mother Vanilla. They seemed like their unusual selves, except Cream and Vanilla had white collars around their necks.

"What's the matter my poor baby?" Vanilla said.

Vanilla walks towards the crib and swoops Rouge out of the crib and into her arms. Vanilla holds Rouge gently and closely: comforting Rouge like mother would with her child. Rouge rest her head Vanilla's shoulder.

"What is wrong with them? And why am I cuddling up to her?" Rough thought.

"What do you think is wrong with sissy mama?" Cream asked.

"I don't know." Vanilla said. "Maybe she's hungry. Or maybe she misses her blankie. It's so hard to tell."

"Apparently you can't tell the difference between a baby and an adult either." Rouge thought.

"We'll figure it out soon enough." Vanilla said, setting Rouge back into her crib. "I'll go to the kitchen and grab her a bottle. Cream, look around the house for Rouge's blankie." Vanilla commanded. Cream nodded yes in response.

"I'll keep an eye on her, for you Ms. Vanilla." Tails said.

"Why thank you Tails." Vanilla says. Vanilla and Cream leave the room.

"What did you do to me freak?" Rouge thought.

"I know you have a lot of questions, Rouge." Tails said. "Let me explain. Since you've been acting like a thieving brat, I've been getting sick of it. I decided that instead of a punishment, that you deserve a second chance. You get to start over and learn how to be a good girl, and that collar will make sure of it. It's a special mind collar. I programmed it for you to behave like a baby. A lot of what you say or do will resemble the actions of a toddler. But don't worry, you won't be a mindless one. I made sure to keep your conscious so you are aware, and most importantly, learn from this. I also gave collars to Cream and Vanilla to help take care of you When I feel you've grown up enough, I'll take them off. For now, think of this as a learning experience."

While Rouge watched Tails with wide eyes, Rouge's inner thoughts raged. Freaking out about the lunacy of the situation while thinking of every insult for the cruel fox. After Tails finished his explanation, Vanilla and Cream returned. Vanilla held in her hand a bottle and Cream held a baby blanket.

"Look sissy, I found your blankie. And mama got you a baba." Cream said.

Vanilla walked to the crib to pick up Rouge again. Vanilla brought the baby bottle close to Rouge and Rouge instinctively latched on to the rubber nipple. She suckled on the bottle and guzzled the milk inside.

"Well, I have to run. I'll see you three later." Tails said, as he walked towards the door and left the room. "Call me if you need anything."

"I'll get my revenge on that sick fox. But first, I need to do something about this." Rouge thought.

Rouge then passes gas, indicating that something is taking place with her bowels. She felt something warm and mushy form in the back of her diaper, along with a foul smell emitting from the region. Rouge realized that she pooped her diaper.

"That's something I didn't want!" Rouge thought.

Vanilla picked up the scent. "Look's like someone made a big stinkie her diape." She said, patting her diaper. "Let's get that dirty diaper off you."

Vanilla lied Rouge on the changing table nearby. She removed Rouge's onsie, leaving her uncovered, then buckled her down to the table to make sure she didn't squirm around too much. Vanilla gathered the necessary supplies. Vanilla opened Rouge's diaper; the fouls smell emitting from her diaper strengthened and knocked back both Vanilla and Cream. Cream held her nose in disgust while Vanilla pulled herself together and continued. Vanilla elevated Rouge's legs, wiped her dirty bottom clean, removed the used diaper, sealed it, and threw the diaper away. Then Vanilla laid down the new diaper, rubbed some baby oil on to her privates and bottom, powdered both places, and sealed the diaper. A new, clean diaper decorated with little pink hearts. Vanilla unbuckled the restraints and picked up the mostly naked bat and patting her bottom.

"There we are sweetie, a diaper change with love. It matches your diaper perfectly." Vanilla said, planting a kiss on her cheek.

"Why me?" Rouge thought.

The machine had left her with the mental state of an 18-month-old. Her cries echoed through the woods. But, luckily, a passing explorer heard. They followed the wails to Rouge’s location. 134.content:
Rouge walked through the front door of her home. She closed it on her way in and leaned on it. She looked worn out. Her eyes were weary and her mood lackluster. She returned from one last debriefing of her latest mission from G.U.N.. After a stressful few days of espionage and high tension, she wanted to relax. She let out a small smile.

“It’s time to kick back.” Rouge thought.

First, she closed her blinds. She didn’t want anyone peeping in on her. Then, she made her way to her bedroom. While walking to her bedroom, she striped down to nothing, leaving a trail of clothes on the way. A bare naked Rouge walked towards her closet and opened it. She pulled out a soft duffle bag; a white bag with pink highlights and a few butterfly patches on it.

“There’s my diaper bag.” Rouge thought.

She opened her diaper bag. In it contained baby powder, ointments, baby oil, a changing mat, mittens, booties, baby wipes, bibs, a teddy bear, baby bottles, some pacifiers, and a hefty pack of diapers. She took out a diaper, a pack of wipes, a bottle of baby oil, a bottle of baby powder, her changing mat, and some pink booties. She placed the changing mat on to her bed and spread her diaper on top of the mat. She sat on to her diaper. The softness of the diaper teased her; stimulating her. It caused her to blush hard, breath heavy, and bite her lower lip. She set some pillows behind her to elevate herself for the change. She wiped down her privates, slathered them in baby oil, and applied a more than generous amount of baby powder. She taped up her diaper. She liked how it hugged her lower self. She wore a thick, babyish diaper. So thick, it spread her legs apart. It had a white base, pink highlights, and pink and purple hearts on the front and rear. It felt good to Rouge. She had a dumbfounded smile on her face from admiring the diaper.

“Baby Wouge wuvs her diapes.” She thought.

She slipped on her pink booties and waddled to her diaper bag. She pulled out a baby bottle and a pacifier with a lanyard. She popped in the pacifier into her mouth, placed the lanyard around her neck, and struggled towards the kitchen. She had trouble keeping her balance. Her diaper had spread her legs a little too far apart. She fell on her diapered bottom.

"Looks like Wouge is crawling." she thought.

She crawled on her hands and knees towards the kitchen. She used the nearby kitchen cabinets to bring herself back to her feet. She moved towards the fridge and took out a bottle of milk. She poured some milk into her baby bottle. She waddled, starting to get better, her way to the living room. She plopped herself on the couch, grabbed the TV remote on the coffee table, and turned on the TV for her to watch mindlessly. She took the baby bottle and started sucking at the milk. She had bliss.

Vanilla searched the diaper bag, pulling out a changing mat, wipes, baby powder, and a clean diaper. She laid down the changing mat on the floor and placed the changing supplies on the side. “Now let’s change that poopy diaper of yours.” Vanilla said.

She began wiping up the mess from Rouge’s bottom; cleaning every square inch of her cheeks and cervix. Vanilla hummed a light lullaby to soothe Rouge. Rouge enjoyed every bit of the service. Vanilla grabbed the clean diaper and raised Rouge’s legs to elevate her bottom. “There we go, all clean now.” Vanilla said. “Now let get you dressed. I have something for you to wear.”

Vanilla stepped into her closet. She stepped out with Rouge’s outfit in hand and dressed Rouge. Two months ago, Rouge learned something from her growing fixation with diapers. She learned that she wanted a caretaker. She had dreams of being helpless. To be dependent on the care of someone else. To have someone she can trust to take care of her. She wanted a mommy. She deducted that Vanilla would be the perfect mommy. She’s known to be kind, motherly, and open minded. She felt glad that Cream is growing up, but missed the simple days of caring for an infant daughter. Rouge had found her mother.

From that day, Rouge became Vanilla's baby. The two of them made time for these, as they would call it, playdates. Rouge’s desires were fulfilled by Vanilla as Vanilla tended to Rouge’s needs such as feedings, burpings, playing, and diaper changes. Vanilla felt whole taking care of Rouge. She'd be out just doing her day to day things when suddenly her bladder would spasm and she'd need to make a mad dash for the bathroom. At first she thought she was having some sort of bladder related problem, so she went and saw a doctor about it, suffice to say it was an embarrassing experience, and not helpful in the slightest. The doctor seemed to believe the root cause of her frantic bladder was stress, nothing physically wrong with her, just stress. Of course this information didn't help her in the slightest, she tried to calm herself down, but it just didn't work. When her bladder acted up and she tried to calm herself, well it was just a perfect storm, what soon followed were wet panties. Yup, she'd calmed herself so much her bladder just went ahead and took her out of the equation. Thankfully she'd been at home when it happened, but now she needed answers, convinced her bladder wasn't just being affected by stress alone, she'd need to seek out a way to stop herself from having accidents. But first, she'd need to prevent them from happening, it was getting worse, always having less and less time to make it to the bathroom, even waking up to a wet bed on a few occasions. She didn't want to think about it, but she worried what would happen if it became more than just her bladder that was acting up? So Blaze needed a plan.

1432.content:
Cream’s request perplexed Blaze. To see a mature child like herself wanting to be treated like a toddler baffled her. And asking Blaze, her most dignified friend, to participate in this charade is the cherry on top of this conundrum.

"Cream, why would you want to be a baby?" Blaze asked.

"Because it's fun." Cream said. "You can have all the fun you want as a baby. You don't have to worry about anything as a baby. All you have to do is eat, sleep, play, and wear your diapers."

"You do this because you find enjoyment in acting like a baby. Does anyone else know about this?" Blaze asked, pushing further for answers.

"Just Mama. You're the first friend I've told." said Cream.

"Really?" Blaze said. Cream nodded in reply. "Cream, I'm touched."

"I was hoping we could play together. We can be like baby sisters." Cream said. "Can we?"

Blaze didn't know what to decide. To have a royal lineage degrade herself in such childish antics seemed like madness. But, to Blaze, Cream is like a little sister to her; she wanted to support her, no matter how strange she could be.

"Alright. Let's be babies." Blaze said

Cream cheered in delight. She hugged Blaze. "Thank you, Blaze. I call the big sister."


Cream prepped for the upcoming diaper change for the both of them. She brought out a changing mat, a bottle of baby powder, a pack of wipes, and some diapers. There lied a couple diapers designed to fit someone of Cream's size, and the one Cream presented Blaze earlier. Cream placed her bottom on the changing mat, then lied down on her back.

"Blaze, I know I'm supposed to be the big sister, but can you change me? I have trouble putting a diaper on myself sometimes." Cream said.

"But I don't know how to change diapers." Blaze said.

"I can help you." Cream said.

Cream instructed Blaze to remove her panties underneath. Blaze removed Cream's panties from under her dress. She and Cream blushed at this intimate moment. Blaze's eye's darted away from Cream; too embarrassed to even look at her. With her head turned right and Cream out of her vision, Blaze placed the diaper under the rabbit's bottom.

"You put it on backwards." Cream said.

Blaze apologized for her mistake. She pulled herself together and faced Cream with a heavy blush, ready to receive more instructions. Blaze removed the diaper, prepped it properly under Cream's bottom, powdered Cream's privates generously, and sealed the diaper snugly. Cream raised herself up. She raised her dress to peek at her diaper, admiring Blaze's work. She admired Blaze's result for her first diaper change; the diaper fit well and there wasn't a mess.

"Good job, Blaze. Now it's your turn to be diapered." Cream said.

Blaze's face burned red with embarrassment. "I think I can handle it myself Cream. I'll just step into the bathroom and change."

"Oh ok." Cream said, somewhat disappointed. "Take these supplies with you." Cream handed Blaze a large enough diaper, a pack of baby wipes, and a bottle of baby powder. "Oh, and take this to wear too." Cream handed Blaze a lavender T-shirt. "You left it here the last time you slept over." Blaze thanked Cream for the supplies, then walked towards the bathroom. But before she left the room, she stoped to ask Cream a question.

"Oh ,Cream. Where did you get a diaper this large anyway?" Blaze asked.

"My mom bought a pack that were the wrong size." Cream said.


Blaze entered the the bathroom with the supplies in tow. She placed the supplies on the vanity. She slid off her shoes and peeled off her tights and top, leaving her in nothing but a white bra and matching panties. Blaze picked up the diaper lying on the vanity. She hesitated from putting it on.

"This is strange." Blaze thought."I have never imagine something like this happening to me. I imagined I'd be destroyed before this. But I promised Cream."

Blaze took a deep breath. She removed her panties and lied the diaper over the toilet lid, spreading it outward. Blaze placed her bottom onto the diaper. Blaze positioned herself correctly to make sure the diaper would fit. She grabbed the baby powder bottle and spread the powder over her nether regions. She sealed up the diaper and checked the lining to make sure it fit comfortably. This garment gave Blaze mixed emotions. Mature others like her taking part in acting like a baby felt odd and humiliating to her. But, it felt nice. As strange as it sounds, wearing diapers gave her some form of comfort, not just because of how soft the padding was. It gave her some security. A reminisce of a simpler time. Blaze picked up her clothes off the bathroom floor, put them in a neat stack next to the sink, slid on the lavender shirt, picked up the supplies, and left the bathroom.


Blaze returned to Cream, finding her rolling a ball around with Cheese. Cream gasped, her mouth gaped open in awe at the sight of Blaze, finding her to be an adorable baby.

"You look so cute!" Cream cheered.

"Thank you." Blaze said, lightly blushing at Compliment. "Is there anything else I need to know?"

"Will you change me if I use my diaper?" Cream asked.

Blaze's eyes widened. "Let's put a pin in that."

"Oh, we can't be babies without these." Cream said. She pulled out ...

1432221322.title: Sleepy sisters

144.content:
On a sunny day, within in a nearby forest, a violet kitten named Blaze walked eagerly down the current trail. Dressed in her normal attire, and carting a large, purple backpack, Blaze stepped with a quick pace. Then, a thought crossed her mind. She stopped, set her bag on the ground, quickly scoped the surrounding area for any possible onlookers, and double checked her content. Inside her bag was packed with a multitude of adult-sized baby paraphernalia. The bag stocked with diapers, bottles, pacifiers, changing supplies, clothing, and other items that would reduce an adult Mobian to look like an overgrown toddler. Blaze, satisfied with her bag being properly stocked, chucked up her bag and hurried towards her destination.

“Glad everything’s there.” Blaze thought. “I hope she’s home.”

One of Blaze’s greatest secrets is a fascination with diapers and acting like a baby. A desired fostered by a friend. Months ago, on a stormy night, Blaze was caught between pouring rain and booming thunder. For most of the day, she used the forest as training grounds to sharpen her skills. But her session abruptly ended when great, grey clouds rolled in. Fur deeply soaked and shaken by close lightning strikes, Blaze rushed desperately through the forest to find some shelter. Luckily, she stumbled onto a friend’s place. Blaze’s friend offered hospitality, letting her sleep through the night and make use of the facilities.

After a hot shower and being offered some sleepwear, a blanket, and a pillow, she rested herself on the couch. After a half hour, she couldn’t sleep. She tried to rest, but to no avail. Blaze went to check on her friend to see if she was still up, hoping to have some company instead of being alone. Blaze saw the bedroom door slightly cracked and peeked in to see her slumbering friend. They slept heavily and tossed heavily to the point the bedding slid right off. Then, Blaze spotted what was underneath their nightwear. It looked to be a diaper; one with pink, pastel, highlights and pink, cartoon teddy bears. Blaze silently returned to the couch, processing what just happened. She never expected a friend to be into something this strange. She lied there, deep in thought, curious and scared how she was going to handle the situation. She barely slept that night.

The next morning, Blaze awoke groggy to the sun shining on her. Her friend finished throwing together breakfast. The two of them ate in an awkward silence. Blaze, hesitant to say anything, ate her breakfast in silence. Her friend looked remorseful, feeling they offended Blaze. Blaze saw the guilt in their friends’ eye; she decided to be direct. Blaze shared the truth. Her friend felt mortified; letting their self be this careless. Blaze reassured them that nothing’s changed; she cared about her friend, no matter what. Her friend hugged her, joyous of Blaze’s acceptance. From then on, a new layer was added to their relationship.

In the passing months, Blazes friend gradually opened more about their diaper interest. Casually wearing diapers around Blaze, using pacifiers or bottles, eventually even wetting themselves in her company. While they grew more open, Blaze grew more curious. A while after the new dynamic developed, Blaze had strange dreams. She dreamt many things from diaper uses to baby play. She worried that she became abnormal. She consulted her friend and they suggested that Blaze may be developing some feelings for the lifestyle and should explore them, instead of repressing. To aid in the self-journey, they retrieve a diaper for Blaze to try. After returning home for the night, Blaze tested the diaper on her. She lied it out, stripped from the waist down, positioned herself, powdered up, and sealed her diaper. She didn’t want to admit it, at first, but wearing it felt right. She felt happy, yet ashamed. She tried to remove the diaper but couldn’t. It felt too good to ditch.

Blaze came to her friend with this discovery, and needed help understanding these new feelings. Her friend eased her into the lifestyle over the course of months; little by little, Blaze explored what she enjoyed about this foreign desire. She learned to accept these feelings and embrace it. And with an understanding friend, she wouldn’t have to feel alone

Blaze arrived at a home, stepping up to the front door. She knocked, waiting for an answer. She waited patiently for her diapered pal…

14422.content:
“Why hello Blaze.” Vanilla greeted. “Come, come inside. I’ll get us some tea.”

Blaze entered Vanilla’s home and made her way to Vanilla’s kitchen. She removed her bag and sat at the table nearby. Vanilla turned on her stovetop and placed a filled kettle on the burner. As the kettle heated, Vanilla joined Blaze at the table.

“So, what brings you by Blaze.” Vanilla asked.

“I came to see Cream.” Blaze said. “I thought we could have another little playdate.”

“Oh.” Vanilla said. Vanilla was aware of Cream and Blaze’s pretend playing. She even was involved in their play-dates once in a while; filling the role as caretaker, tending to the "babies" basic needs. “I’m sorry to tell you this, but Cream isn’t home. She’s out with Amy.”

Then the kettle whistles. Vanilla stepped away to prepare the Tea. Blaze sat silently with a down face. She used to pal around with Cream and forget her troubles, but her timing was off. Vanilla brought over a tray with teacups, cream, and sugar. She served Blaze her glass and took her own. Blaze sadly sipped her tea.

“What’s wrong Blaze?” Vanilla asked.

“I was hoping to see Cream and play.” Blaze explained. “It’s been a bit stressful recently and I needed to help take off some of the stress.”

Vanilla pitied Blaze a moment, then had an idea.

“You know, I could take care of you.” Vanilla suggested. Blaze perked up. “If you need to relax, I can help you. I don’t mind watching over babies, even if they’re big and cute.” Blaze blushed lightly at Vanilla’s compliment, too embarrassed to look at Vanilla.

“I’d appreciate it.” Blaze said. “But I was hoping more for a playmate than a mommy.” Then, an idea struck her. “Maybe you can be my playmate. You could dress up and we could play together.”

“Umm….” Vanilla said, stunned while her face burned red. She wasn’t completely comfortable with the idea of being made up into a big baby, but she was curious to try it and see why it appealed to her daughter.

Blaze took notice of her uneasy look. “I’m sorry. I was just suggesting. I didn’t mean to put you on the spot like that.”

“It’s ok dear.” Vanilla replied. “I was just a bit surprised by your suggestion. I’m not so much against it, but I don’t know if I want to try it.”

“Well, if you want, I can show you.” Blaze said. “If not, I wouldn’t mind having a mommy, epically one as sweet as you.

Vanilla smiled lightly over Blaze’s honeyed words. Vanilla choose to be the role of….
14422.title: Vanilla

144221.content:
“I appreciate the offer, but I’d prefer to be the mommy right now.” Vanilla said. “I’ll be a baby another time.”

“Okay.” Blaze said. She felt a little bummed, but glad to have a mommy to care for her today.

“Let’s go out to the living room and get my baby into a fresh diaper, and something a bit cuter, okay sweetie?” Vanilla said. She gently grabbed Blaze’s hand, showcasing Blaze her warm, motherly aura.

Blaze rose to her feet and picked up her backpack with obligation and pep; ready to follow her “mommy” anywhere. “Okay mommy.” She responded in a cutesy, childish voice. She knew in her gut that Vanilla could be trusted, no matter how strange this was.

Vanilla escorted Blaze to her living room, holding her hand. Once by the sofa, Blaze set down her backpack and dug out her supplies. She dug out a fresh diaper, a changing mat, a set of changing supplies, a pacifier, and her whole outfit. Vanilla laid out the changing mat and grabbed the diaper and changing supplies.

“Mommy?” Blaze asked in her baby voice.

“Yes, Blaze?” Vanilla replied.

“I’s not kno how to’s change cwoths. Cans you help me?” Blaze babbled.

“Of course, sweetheart.” Vanilla chimed. “Mommy’s always here to help. Now, arms up.”

Blaze lifted her arms, obeying Vanilla’s request. Vanilla removed Blaze’s cuffs, slid off her shirt, pulled off her shoes, peeled off her white tights, and plucked her hair-tie; leaving her only in a white, lace bra and matching panties. Blaze gestured Vanilla to remove her last piece of grown up attire, her underwear. Vanilla unhooked Blaze’s bra and stripped her panties. Blaze stood on her knees naked in front of Vanilla, slightly blushing and smiling ecstatically. To be reduced to such an intimate and vulnerable state brought her joy.

“I nakey.” Blaze said, baby like.

‘Yes sweetie.” Vanilla cooed. “Now let’s get my baby in a nice, clean diape.”

Blaze sat her bare bottom on the changing mat, then lied her backside to the ground to properly receive Vanilla’s services. Vanilla first grabbed the pacifier nearby and placed it into Blaze’s mouth. Blaze accepted the pacifier and suckled it with mindless pleasure. Vanilla grabbed the fresh diaper. Once Blaze saw the diaper, she elevated her bottom without response. Once Vanilla positioned the diaper correctly under Blaze and Blaze lied fully down, Vanilla rubbed lotion in Blaze’s area, blanketed it with baby powder, used a powderpuff to cover her area and bottom in talcum, and sealed the diaper nice and snug.

Blaze sat up to admire her diaper. It was thick and puffier than an overstuffed plushie; she rubbed the front to admire its bulk. “Fank you, Mommy.” She said, with a pacifier in her mouth.

“You’re welcome, Blaze.” Vanilla said.

Vanilla dressed Blaze in the outfit laid out. Blaze now wore a frilly, pink, childish dress with matching pink baby booties, pink mittens, and a pink baby bonnet. Blaze felt so precious and sweet; like the cutest baby in the entire world.

“My my my, aren’t you adorable.” Vanilla flattered.

Blaze moved eagerly towards Vanilla; her arms open ready for a hug. Blaze squeezed her tight. “Fank you mommy, yous the bestest mommy eber. I wuv yous”

“I love you too, Blaze” Vanilla said. “It doesn’t matter if you’re a big girl or baby girl, you’ll always be one of my own.” Blaze, touched by Vanilla’s sincerity, kissed Vanilla on the cheek as a show of gratitude.

What’s next for our “mommy” and “kitten”?
