144222.content:
“You know what, I think I’ll give it a try.” Vanilla said. Blaze smiled eagerly. “I want to see what you two like about it.”

“Well, come on. Let’s get changed. We’ll go to the living room, I’ll lay out a mat and ….” Blaze said.

“Actually,” Vanilla interrupted; a burning blush on her face. “I was hoping to change in private.”

“Oh, okay.” Blaze said. “Well, take these with you so you can get changed. I’ll meet you when I’m done getting changed.” Blaze handed Vanilla a diaper and some purple booties. Vanilla took her items and left to her room.

Vanilla entered her room with the supplies. She removed her dress, taking off each layer. She stood in her room in nothing but her white bra and white panties. She walked to her dresser and pulled out a purple t-shirt to wear. Vanilla dressed in her purple shirt and looked at the diaper. It was white with purple highlights and decorated with colorful flowers. She sat next to the diaper, pondering about going through with the act for the past few minutes.

“This is so strange. I’ve been taught to give these up, but here it is big enough to fit me and I’m curious to try it on. I thought that this was a phase Cream’s going through, but maybe there’s more to this than.”

Then, Blaze knocked on Vanilla’s door. “Ms. Rabbit, can I come in? I forgot to give you some more supplies.”

Blaze came in, fully changed into her playdate attire. Blaze wore a pink blouse with puffy sleeves, a short, pink skirt with ruffles, pink booties, a big pink bow in her hair, and a puffy diaper with pink highlights and paw print designs. She saw the uncertainty in Vanilla’s eyes.

“What’s wrong?” Blaze asked.

“I’m just a bit overwhelmed, that’s all.” Vanilla said. “I want to try, but I feel like a shouldn’t.”

“I’ve had these same feelings too.” Blaze said, comforting Vanilla. “But when you try it, it’s actually pretty fun and comforting. If it’s alright with you, I’d like to change you.” Blaze laid out a changing mat.

Seeing Blaze content with the lifestyle persuaded Vanilla to give it a try.

“Okay, let me lie down.” Vanilla said. Vanilla lied down on the changing mat, ready to receive Blaze services.

Blaze removed Vanilla’s panties; Vanilla showing no fuss. Blaze dusted Vanilla’s privates with baby powder and used a powder puff to coat her area. Then Blaze sealed Vanilla’s diaper, taping the sides nice and tight. Once finished, Vanilla raised herself off the ground and stepped to the mirror to check her new look. She couldn’t believe it. She felt strange and silly, yet cute and happy. She pressed her hands on her diaper. It’s odd to wear, and she wasn’t too keen on it spreading her legs a bit, but it felt so soft and hugged her comfortably. It seemed all kind of nice. Then, she came up to Blaze.

“How do you feel Ms. Rabbit?” Blaze asked.

“I feel fine. And this diaper feels nice, it’s very soft.” Vanilla said. Blaze smiled. Vanilla sat on her bed and grabbed the purple booties. “Also, you can call me Vanilla. Ms. Rabbit doesn’t seem appropriate right now.” She slipped on her booties. “Now, what do want to do?”

Blaze decided they should…

1531.title: Vanilla the rabbit

15311.content:
Many knew about Ms. Rabbit. Her mannerism, her kindness, her beauty, her culinary skills, and her motherly aura. But, there’s one secret that no other living mobian knows of; one so personal to the rabbit. She wasn’t just a mature rabbit, she was also a big baby. Vanilla had a strong desire for the childish padding and her infantile persona for as long as she could remember. She’s unsure what started this fascination, but it’s been embedded into her youth ever since. Through most of her life, she’s satisfied her fantasies by wearing diapers, using diapers, lustful pleasures with diapers, acting like a baby, and more. To her, it was all fun. Whether it be strolling around in public while wearing a diaper underneath her skirt, voiding herself in public, playing with toys, drinking bottles, sucking on pacifiers, sleeping in diapers almost every night, packing her diapers full of peepee, poopoo, oatmeal, or anything else, it was all fun to her. While satisfying her desires, she hid them very well. No one else knew of this, not even her own daughter. The only one who ever knew was Cream’s father. She also weaned herself of her urges once Cream turned 18 months old. While it was fun to have mother-daughter baby bonding; sharing toys, having num-num’s, filling diapers, it couldn’t last. It became once in a blue moon. But now, the blue moon dawns again.

Cream left with Amy to have a “girls’ weekend”; it was for the both to bond and have fun. Once Cream left, Vanilla ran into her house to sleep for the night and prepare herself for a special weekend.

A new day dawned on Vanilla’s cottage. Vanilla slept with a pacifier in her mouth and wearing nothing but a thick, poofy, cotton candy pink diaper with blue sides and little blue hearts. She snuggled up to a large teddy bear she grabbed out of Cream’s room. It being almost as big as a mobian made it the perfect cuddle buddy. When sunlight peeked through her windows and shined on her, Vanilla awoke. She sat herself up and yawned. She looked to the bear on her right.

“Good morning, Mr. Bear.” She greeted. “You’re looking very cute this morning. And so am I.” Vanilla rubbed the front of her diaper. “I’m such a naughty baby. People say I’m supposed to be a big girl. I’m too big for diapers. But I say they’re full of poopoo. I can be a grown up and a baby. They can all take a big stinky.”

Then, Vanilla’s stomach gurgled, and she let out a small fart. “Speaking of stinkies.”

Vanilla lied back into her bed. She blushed heavily and smiled for the next part. She relaxed. Then, a familiar brown mush poured into the back of her diaper. Her diaper expanding by the mush; mucking up her whole bottom. Vanilla felt great ecstasy for her devious act; she panted heavily, her pulse skyrocketing, she looked like she was about to faint. Then, she finished. While catching her breath, she lied in her mess in satisfaction. To be relieved of that pressure in her backside felt fantastic. Vanilla rised to her feet. She walked over to the bedroom mirror to inspect the aftermath.

“My my, what a mess you made.” She though, while examining the diaper. She groped her messy back-end. “Baby wipes alone is going to fix this. You going to need a shower. But first...” Vanilla stepped towards the nearest wall. She turned around, then pressed her bottom to the wall. The mess in the used diaper overspread, covering her whole bottom in mush. She rubbed and pressed her buttocks on the wall. While being devious with her tail side, Vanilla lost herself in the act. To exacerbate it brought her excitement; she bit onto lower lip to contain her cries. Vanilla rubbed her diaper front rapidly with her free hand. She needed to reach the end. After a few short minutes, Vanilla reached her tipping point and climaxed. She wailed with ecstasy, shouting loud enough to shake the walls. “Now I definitely need a shower.”

Vanilla entered her bathroom and made way to her shower. Once inside, she untapped her used diaper, letting it fall to the floor. She rolled up the diaper and tossed it in the trash. Vanilla ran some hot water and took the showers’ wand. She sprayed down her own cheeks and anywhere else there would be mess. Vanilla lathered her fur with soap, rinsed herself clean, cut the water, stepped out, grabbed a towel, and dried herself.

Once completely dry, our naked mother entered her room. She opened her closed to get to a mysterious trunk. This trunk contained Vanilla’s diapers, baby things, and a few other kinks. She grabbed her necessary changing supplies and a baby bib, then cleaned herself up. She now wore a purple disposable diaper with small pink hearts in the front, and a big, pink heart right on her bottom. She also sported a purple baby bib. Once padded, Vanilla left her room to head to the kitchen and make breakfast.

What’s the plan for our naughty baby after breakfast?

153112.content:
Breakfast had gone according to plan. As much as Vanilla's indulgence in all things infantile encompassed so many activities; there was the subject of breakfast which she always preferred as her regular 'adult' self. French toast, a pot of tea -- albeit sipped from a large baby bottle and a small selection of fruit and orange juice was the perfect way to start the weekend. Her infantile behaviours and pleasures were still incorporated into her breakfast routine, allowing crumbs, chunks of fruit and small dribbles of tea from her baby bottle to drip onto her purple bib with reckless abandon.

With Mr. Bear accompanying Vanilla, the prospect of playing dress up was something she sorely missed from her regular Infantilist sessions. She entered her bedroom; idly discarding her purple bib onto a nearby table and glancing at Mr. Bear with an open smile, "It's time for dress up, Mr. Bear. What do you think I should wear today?"

A collection of clothing found in her wardrobe had been hand-crafted especially for her slim figure, made entirely from the finest of materials with an equal handful of accessories to boot -- her onesies, dresses, shortalls and other infantile clothes stood out amongst Vanilla's usual dress wear.

"Why don't you pick something for bun bun, Mr. Bear?" Vanilla glanced at the teddy, while no obvious answer came, she took the silence as if a real answer was being heard.

"Good idea," Vanilla chirped, she nodded in agreement and reached inside for a piece of clothing. "It's so pretty. I haven't worn this in such a long time, Mr. Bear."

She pulled something out -- slowly revealing and displaying the clothing to Mr. Bear. "What do you think?"
153112.title: Dress Up for Vanilla

your favorite girls from "Sonic" into diapers for whatever reason.


         Rules/Notices
-This story contains AB/DL themes
-This story contains mature themes
-Please keep the story mostly focused on the female you choose
-Other females are allowed in the story of the female of choice (side characters, caretakers, playmates, etc)
-Males from "Sonic" are allowed (side characters, caretakers, playmates, etc)
-Writing characters to wet and/or mess their diapers is allowed
-Writing characters to wet and/or mess their pants/panties is allowed
-Explicit description and/or extensive use of scat isn't allowed. The mess should be kept mostly in their diapers

-Reality warping situations to put them in diapers are allowed
-Parings are allowed.
